Religion is going to morph into some cotton candy feel good new age spiritualÂ hippy let's smoke some bud and listen to some happy music.Â The fire and brimstone types will make noise but no one is going to pay attention to them and their tin foil hats.Â Â
We live in an amazing Universe that is filled with more wonder and awe then anything thing I have ever read in some 2000 year old book about the mythology of middle eastern sheep herders.Â
Life Always finds new ways to survive.Â I am not saying we should trash the earth.Â I have a feeling in 500 years history will look back at us as the "locust generation" who only cared about ourselves not thinking that we needed to be stewards our or precious world.Â
